title: Q4 - Can a foreign company be registered as a Consent Manager in India?
description: A foreign company can be registered as a Consent Manager in India only if it meets the registration, localisation, and compliance requirements prescribed under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA) and related rules issued by the Central Government.
